Info.Description:
Entity Library File
This base package makes the entitylibrary.fcb able to be modified by a3 packages.
[color=yellow]If a mod collides with this base package, then just simply disable this package, because a mod you want to use probably contains these files.[/color]
[size=1][color=lightgreen]Author: [/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/32262030][b]LinkHero95[/b][/url][/size]
